review_data.title: Mittagessen und Apero
review_data.content: Gutes und sehr feines Essen....ich kann nur empfehlen. Sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Servicepersonal.

review_data.title: An insider Tip for everyone
review_data.content: A hidden gem in plain sight in the center of Zurich offering delicious Italian Food and good cocktails. Ideal for a casual business lunch and after work drinks. Try Linguine con Gamberi or Cotoletta Di Vitello, my two favorite plates of Chef Francesco Raponi. The...More

review_data.title: Richtig gutes Team
review_data.content: Schönes, modernes Restaurant und Bar, beim HB Zürich. Beste Pasta in Zürich gegessen. Linguine mit Krevetten sind ein Gedicht

review_data.title: Wonderful restaurant & bar one minute away from the train station
review_data.content: The location is perfect one minute away from the train station with a terrasse outside the restaurant. For lunch, they have delicious Italian food like linguine with shrimps, and the red wine was very good as well. I came back for the apero in the...More
